title: Icons
summary: Icons are a powerful tool in the interface. They condense complex ideas into simple visuals, making actions and information easier to recognize at a glance. When used consistently, icons strengthen brand expression, improve usability, and create a more intuitive experience.

sections.title: How to use, and how not to use icons
sections.section-content: Here you’ll find guidance on how to use icons - from placement, sizes, and colors to best practices. We’ll also highlight how icons should not be used. More information will be added soon.
